c74object.name: the.jit.gl.warping
c74object.digest: Apply grid-based warping to a texture
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze © 2021, www.xenorama.com.
Use the.jit.gl.warping to apply a grid-based warping to an incoming texture. This is useful to adapt projections to tilted or uneven surfaces precisely and can be inserted as final instance before jit.world or a jit.gl.cornerpin for final output warping.

objarg.name: ctx
objarg.description: Named drawing context. Explicitly required since the internal jit.gl.node does not automatically draw to the parent context.

attribute.name: blend
attribute.description: Blend mode. All natively available blend-modes for JitterGL-objects are supported.

attribute.name: draw
attribute.description:
Draw grid/points. Depending on the draw_grid and draw_points attributes, will draw either the grid, point or both.
The ui_key 'w' can be used to toggle drawing when ui_listen is enabled.

attribute.name: draw_grid
attribute.description:
Draw grid. Depending on the draw attribute.
The ui_key 'g' can be used to toggle drawing when ui_listen is enabled.

attribute.name: draw_points
attribute.description:
Draw Points. Depending on the draw attribute.
The ui_key 'p' can be used to toggle drawing when ui_listen is enabled.

attribute.name: file
attribute.digest: Read a previously saved warping file (JSON)
attribute.description: Read a previously saved warping file (JSON). This is necessary to recall previous setups. See also the read and write methods.

attribute.name: grid_color
attribute.description: RGBA of grid color. This will override the alpha setting, send RGB-values to maintain the latest opacity setting.

attribute.name: line_width
attribute.description: Thickness of grid lines. The default is 3

attribute.name: point_size
attribute.description: Size of circles. The default is 1

attribute.name: selection_color
attribute.digest: RGBA of selected point in grid
attribute.description: RGBA of selected point in grid. This will override the alpha setting, send RGB-values to maintain the latest opacity setting.

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: X/Y-grid of warping points. THis will initialize and reset the grid to dimensions provided.

attribute.name: ui_listen
attribute.description:
Use keyboard shortcuts. The following commands are available:
w = draw grid and/or points on texture, see the draw attribute
g = toggle grid drawing, see the draw_grid attribute
p = toggle point drawing, see the draw_points attribute
↑ (up) = select point above
↓ (down) = select point beneath
← (left) = select point to the left
→ (right) = select point to the right
(shift + arrows) = change position of point
(shift + page-up/page-down) = change resolution of steps (in fractions of 10), default: 0.01 (of normalized dimensions)
hint: keep inc/dec arrows pressed to scroll through points/shift them

attribute.name: warp
attribute.description: Apply warping. Any incoming texture will have previously set warping applied.

method.name: pictslider
method.digest: Use pictslider coordinates to navigate through points
method.description: Use pictslider coordinates to navigate through points. Natively set to 0-127, the word pictslider followed by a list of two coordinates will navigate through the warping grid selecting a new point.

method.name: point
method.description: Navigate to a specific point. Provide coordinates within the specified range of size.

method.name: read
method.digest: Load a prebiously saved warping file (JSON)
method.description: Load a prebiously saved warping file (JSON)

method.name: reset
method.digest: Initialize the grid to previously set dimensions
method.description: Initialize the grid to previously set dimensions. All previously applied warping will be initialized.

method.name: resize
method.digest: Resized the grid to new dimensions
method.description: Resized the grid to new dimensions. Any previously set warping points will be maintained and interpolated when downsampled from previous resolution. Incraesing and decreasing this listing can apply nurbs-like interpolation on sharp warping edges.

method.name: ui_key
method.description: Keyboard commands. See the ui_listen attribute for details.

method.name: writeagain
method.digest: Resave previously saved settings as warping file (JSON)
method.description: Resave previously saved settings as warping file (JSON)
